definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
descendants of the Fiery Emperor and the Yellow Emperor (i.e. Han Chinese people)

sentences.english: So you testify against yourselves that you are the descendants of those who murdered the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 这就是你们自己证明，是杀害先知者的子孙了。

sentences.english: They believe themselves to be descendants of the Great Tree, a sacred tree in the forests.
sentences.chinese: 他们相信自己是森林里的一棵圣树“大树”的子孙。

sentences.english: The children of Hariph, an hundred and twelve.
sentences.chinese: 哈拉的子孙一百一十二名。

sentences.english: Our fur-clad descendents will be crouched over fires.
sentences.chinese: 我们的子孙将穿裘裹皮，蜷缩在火堆旁。

sentences.english: The children of Harim, three hundred and twenty.
sentences.chinese: 哈琳的子孙三百二十名。

sentences.english: And of the Levites， Ahijah was over the treasures of the house of God， and over the treasures of the dedicated things.
sentences.chinese: 利未子孙中有亚希雅掌管神殿的府库和圣物的府库。

sentences.english: The children of Immer, a thousand fifty and two.
sentences.chinese: 音麦的子孙一千零五十二名。

sentences.english: So the Levites made preparations for themselves and for the Aaronic priests.
sentences.chinese: 所以利未人为自己和祭司亚伦的子孙，预备祭物。

sentences.english: But the fish gate did the sons of Hassenaah build, who also laid the beams thereof, and set up the doors thereof, the locks thereof, and the bars thereof.
sentences.chinese: 哈西拿的子孙建立鱼门，架横梁，安门扇，和闩锁。

sentences.english: Through born from the same heritage, we are all affected by the different worlds around us.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我们都是炎黄子孙，却受着不同环境的影响。

sentences.english: The LORD shall increase you more and more, you and your children.
sentences.chinese: 愿耶和华叫你们和你们的子孙，日见加增。

sentences.english: All the towns for the priests, the descendants of Aaron, were thirteen, together with their pasturelands.
sentences.chinese: 亚伦子孙作祭司的共有十三座城，还有属城的郊野。

sentences.english: The children of Elam, a thousand two hundred fifty and four.
sentences.chinese: 以拦的子孙一千二百五十四名。

sentences.english: The gas is does, endure is the enemy, but to leave the bitterest curse of ground, children in crops.
sentences.chinese: 气是无明火，忍是敌灾星，但留方寸地，把于子孙耕。

sentences.english: Now the sons of Gad lived opposite them in the land of B ashan as far as Salecah .
sentences.chinese: 迦得的子孙在流便对面，住在巴珊地，延到撒迦。

sentences.english: Unto Shem also, the father of all the children of Eber, the brother of Japheth the elder, even to him were children born.
sentences.chinese: 雅弗的哥哥闪，是希伯子孙之祖，他也生了儿子。

definition: relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
